summary: Busking platform for musicians to create accounts, upload categorized media (recordings/live sessions/videos), and receive per-upload donations via Stripe with a 10% platform administration fee.
architectural_notes: Use Stripe (likely Stripe Connect) to route donations to artists and apply a 10% platform fee.
Use browser-based audio/video players to stream uploaded media items (ensure proper formats and CORS/content-type handling).
Use Stripe Checkout sessions for guest donations (integrated with Stripe Connect payout to artists and 10% platform fee).
Ensure Stripe Checkout supports guest card payments for donations (no account required).

existing_features.title: Implement artist authentication using Internet Identity and provide an artist onboarding flow to create/update an artist profile (display name, bio, avatar image URL or uploaded avatar) and manage their public page.

Add categorized media uploads for artists: allow an authenticated artist to upload multiple files in one action; each uploaded file must be persisted as a separate media item with title, description, category (Recording / Live Session / Video), optional tags, and a created timestamp.

Create a public browsing experience for guests to discover artists and media items by category, including a landing page, category browse views, and basic search/filter (by artist name and/or item title).

Add a Stripe donation flow where each media item has a Donate button for guests; donations must be paid into the artistâ€™s connected Stripe account, and the platform must collect a 10% application/admin fee from each donation.

Implement Stripe account connection for artists (Stripe Connect-style onboarding): artists must be able to connect/disconnect their Stripe account and see connection status; donations must be disabled (with a clear message) for items when the artist has not connected Stripe.
Provide an artist dashboard to manage media items (list, edit metadata, delete), view donation totals (lifetime and per item), and view recent donations.

Add a coherent, distinctive visual theme and information architecture for a busking/musician donation platform (typography, color palette, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across landing, browse, artist pages, and dashboard (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette).

Add static generated image assets (logo, default avatar, and media placeholder thumbnails) and render them in the UI where appropriate (logo in header/landing; default avatar when artist has none; media placeholder when no thumbnail is available).

Enable in-browser playback for uploaded media items: render an audio player for Recording/Live Session items and a video player for Video items, using the uploaded media file URL so guests can play sound and videos directly in the UI.

Make guest donation/support via Stripe Checkout accessible anywhere media is browsed (landing page recent uploads, category browse pages, and artist pages) by ensuring each MediaCard has the required artist + donation-enabled context to show the "Support Artist" button when available, and by using the existing Stripe Checkout session redirect flow.
Add backend and frontend support to fetch browseable media together with enough artist donation context to render donation CTAs without per-card N+1 fetches.

new_feature_requests.summary: Upload and manage media items (recordings, live sessions, videos) with category assignment
Support multiple file upload where each uploaded file becomes a separate item
Donation flow: donate button on each media item for guests to contribute
Stripe integration for donations paid into artists' Stripe accounts with 10% platform fee
Enable in-app media playback for uploaded audio and video items (sound + video playback in the browser UI)
Implement guest donation/support via Stripe Checkout (Checkout session flow for donating to an artist/media item)
Enable card payments for guest donations (pay by card at checkout)
